title: WTB: PSA or SGC 1-2 Waddell Portrait

posts.post_title: WTB: PSA or SGC 1-2 Waddell Portrait
posts.post_content:
Looking for Rube Waddell portrait, low grade, PSA or SGC 1-2. If you have anything for sale, please let me know. Back doesn't matter. Thanks in advance. 

Chris
Rube has been secured. Net54 for the win once again.
